com.ijg.darklight.web.api

Class APIRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ijg.darklight.web.api.APIRequest

  • public class APIRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by the DarklightAPI, acts as a container for an API request
    Version:
    .1
    Author:
    Isaac Grant, Lucas Nicodemus
    See Also:
    DarklightAPI

    • Constructor Detail

      • APIRequest

        public APIRequest(java.lang.String protocol,
          java.lang.String server,
          java.lang.String requestURL,
          java.lang.String query)
        Parameters:
        protocol - The protocol used by the API server, usually http
        server - The http address of the API server
        requestURL - The URL to send the API request to
        query - The actual query to be sent

        public java.lang.Object get(java.lang.String query)
        Get an object from the JSON response
        Parameters:
        query - The JSON key to retrieve from the response
        Returns:
        The JSON value for the given key (query)
